scripts.copy-static: cp index.html capture.html styles.css tailwind.config.js tailwindcss.js manifest.json dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-content-scripts && npx esbuild App.tsx index.tsx background.ts 'components/*.tsx' 'utils/*.ts' firebase.ts capture.js --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --splitting --jsx=automatic && npm run copy-static
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run build-content-scripts && npx esbuild App.tsx index.tsx background.ts 'components/*.tsx' 'utils/*.ts' firebase.ts capture.js --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --splitting --jsx=automatic --minify && npm run copy-static
